subject: SNHU 2025 Stackable Credentials Initiative
body: Dear Students, We are excited to announce the SNHU 2025 initiative focusing on stackable credentials. This program allows you to earn micro-credentials that build towards degree completion. Key milestones include: Module 1 completion by Dec 15, Module 2 by Jan 30. These credentials are recognized by industry partners and align with in-demand skills.

subject: SDN Networking Course - Spring 2024
body: Greetings, The Software Defined Networking (SDN) course is now available for Spring 2024 registration. This hands-on course covers network virtualization, OpenFlow protocols, and cloud networking. Prerequisites: IT-201. Skills gained: Network automation, Python scripting for networks, and cloud infrastructure management.

subject: Skills Assessment Feedback - IT Program
body: Hello, Your recent skills assessment shows strong competency in database management and web development. Areas for improvement: Cloud computing fundamentals, DevOps practices. We recommend the following stepping stones: 1) Complete AWS Cloud Practitioner, 2) Docker containerization workshop, 3) CI/CD pipeline project.
